00093         static void* LoadFile(const char* pFileName)
00094                 { return LoadFile(pFileName, false); }
00095 
00096         static SHPStruct* LoadSHPFile(const char* pFileName)
00097                 { return (SHPStruct*)LoadFile(pFileName, true); }
00098 
00099         //I'm just making this up for easy palette loading
00100         static ConvertClass* LoadPALFile(const char* pFileName, DSurface* pSurface)
00101         {
00102                 ColorStruct* pRawData = (ColorStruct*)LoadFile(pFileName, false);
00103                 BytePalette ColorData;
00104 
00105                 for(int i = 0; i < 0x100; i++)
00106                 {
00107                         ColorData[i].R = pRawData[i].R << 2;
00108                         ColorData[i].G = pRawData[i].G << 2;
00109                         ColorData[i].B = pRawData[i].B << 2;
00110                 }
00111 
00112                 return new ConvertClass(
00113                         &ColorData,
00114                         (BytePalette*)0x885780,
00115                         pSurface,
00116                         0x35,
00117                         0);
00118         }
00119 };
